sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,APP_TRACT_ID ,TRANS_MER_ID ,TRANS_RATE ,LOWEST_FEE ,HIGHEST_FEE ,MER_PROFIT ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,APP_TRACT_TYPE ,REMARK ,RESERVED FROM MER_APP_TRACT WHERE 1=1 AND MER_APP_TRACT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(APP_TRACT_ID) =#app_tract_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#mer_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(APP_TRACT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#app_tract_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_APP_TRACT WHERE 1=1 AND MER_APP_TRACT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(APP_TRACT_ID) =#app_tract_id#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#mer_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(APP_TRACT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#app_tract_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
